index
Class IndexUtils

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--index.IndexUtils
public class IndexUtils
extends java.lang.Object

IndexUtils class opens an index scan based on selection conditions. Currently only BTree_scan is supported

Method Detail

BTree_scan

public static IndexFileScan BTree_scan(CondExpr[] selects,
                                       IndexFile indFile)
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       UnknownKeyTypeException,
                                       InvalidSelectionException,
                                       KeyNotMatchException,
                                       UnpinPageException,
                                       PinPageException,
                                       IteratorException,
                                       ConstructPageException
BTree_scan opens a BTree scan based on selection conditions
Parameters:
selects - conditions to apply
indFile - the index (BTree) file
Returns:
an instance of IndexFileScan (BTreeFileScan)
Throws:
java.io.IOException - from lower layer
UnknownKeyTypeException - only int and string keys are supported
InvalidSelectionException - selection conditions (selects) not valid
KeyNotMatchException - Keys do not match
UnpinPageException - unpin page failed
PinPageException - pin page failed
IteratorException - iterator exception
ConstructPageException - failed to construct a header page
